mapper.insert: insert into movie (accessKey, title, subTitle, explanation, genre) values ( #{accessKey}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{explanation}, #{genre} )
mapper.update: update movie set title=#{updateParam.title}, subTitle=#{updateParam.subTitle}, explanation=#{updateParam.explanation}, genre=#{updateParam.genre}, accessKey=#{updateParam.accessKey} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
